name: Witches' Library
description:
This project is a freely explorable environment made as a portfolio piece. Its focus was the external appearances but it also contains some rough furniture, to give an idea of how a player would navigate the environment.

It was developed as a hub from which the player would receive quests from various themed NPC's and depart for the levels via portals of various making contained inside the rooms.

Based on Sebastian Luca's Floating Architecture Concept
Environment Art by Andrea Graizzaro
Programming by Matteo Graizzaro
Artstation Breakdowns
Level Walkthrough

Commands:

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to control the camera
  • 1 to toggle between Normal (Walking) and Ghost (No Collision and Fly) 
  • +/- or Middle Mouse button to change the flying speed
  • Esc/M to open the Menu
  • Z to respawn
